briefTitle: A Long-term Extension Study for the Phase 3 Study of Nalmefene (339-14-001) in Patients With Alcohol Dependence
officialTitle: A Long-term Extension Study for the Phase 3 Study of Nalmefene (339-14-001) in Patients With Alcohol Dependence
summary: The long-term safety and efficacy of nalmefene hydrochloride at 20 mg in patients with alcohol dependence will be evaluated in a multicenter, open-label, uncontrolled trial.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events

effectByArm.arm: Nalmefene 20 mg in the lead-in Study
Nalmefene 10 mg in the lead-in Study
